data.description_suggestion: Partially updates a page in the specified blog. Only provided fields in the Page object will be modified; omitted fields remain unchanged. Requires the blog ID and page ID. Returns the updated Page object with all current properties.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. Added clarity about partial update semantics (key difference from PUT), required parameters, and return value. Empty summary needed creation. Improved AI agent interpretability by explaining when to use PATCH vs PUT.

data.current_description: Updates a page by blog id and page id.
